程序包 aurelienribon.tweenengine

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    TweenAccessor<T>
    The TweenAccessor interface lets you interpolate any attribute from any object.
    TweenCallback
    TweenCallbacks are used to trigger actions at some specific times.
    TweenEquations
    Collection of built-in easing equations
    TweenPath
    Base class for every paths.
    TweenPaths
    Collection of built-in paths.
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    BaseTween<T>
    BaseTween is the base class of Tween and Timeline.
    Timeline
    A Timeline can be used to create complex animations made of sequences and parallel sets of Tweens.
    Tween
    Core class of the Tween Engine.
    TweenEquation
    Base class for every easing equation.
    TweenManager
    A TweenManager updates all your tweens and timelines at once.
    TweenUtils
    Collection of miscellaneous utilities.
